metadata.synopsis: Memnos is outraged after the player betrays the refugees in favour of the attacking goblins.

0.speaker: Memnos
0.text: You backstabbing birna mrag! We trusted you!
0.context: NodeContext: Angry and accusatory, pre-combat. Birna mrag meaning 'piece of shit' in the infernal language. Pronounced 'BIRna mRAG'
